sentences.en: Can the company reimburse me for my professional travel?
sentences.cn: 公司能偿还我的职业旅行费 吗 .

sentences.en: He'd sooner swim to Europe than agree to reimburse the company out of his own pocket.
sentences.cn: 对他来说与其自己掏腰包来偿付公司费用,还不如越过大洋游欧洲去.
我想他们差不多要给您报销100%.

sentences.en: I'll be happy to reimburse you for any expenses you might have incurred.

sentences.en: I'll be happy to reimburse you for any expenses you've had.

sentences.en: I'll reimburse you for any extra expense on your part.

sentences.en: Please reimburse yourselves to debit our account with ○○ Bank New York branch.

sentences.en: The company will reimburse you out of petty cash.

sentences.en: This will reimburse you for your trouble.

sentences.en: We will reimburse any expenses incurred.

sentences.en: We will reimburse the customer for any loss or damage.

sentences.en: We'll reimburse you for your travelling expenses.
